Profile_Add_placeholder: Add specific instructions for how you want the AI to behave during
Profile_Personalize: Personalize the AI's behavior with specific instructions that will be added to the
Language_Message: Language for navigation throughout the application, IF YOU NEED TO RESET THIS OPTION
LangIA_Language: Language for speech recognition and AI responses
Layout_Smaller: Smaller window size with reduced padding and font sizes for minimal screen footprint
Layout_Standard: Standard layout with comfortable spacing and font sizes
Layout_Adjust: Adjust the transparency of the interface background elements
Layout_AdjustFont: Adjust the font size of AI response text in the assistant view
Screen_Screenshots: Screenshots will only be taken when you use the 'Ask Next Step' shortcut
Screen_Automatic: Automatic screenshots will be taken at the specified interval
Keyboard_Restore: Restore all keyboard shortcuts to their default values
Google_Allow: Allow the AI to search Google for up-to-date information and facts during conversations
Google_Changes: Changes take effect when starting a new AI session
Message_Impotant: üí° Settings are automatically saved as you change them. Changes will take effect immediately or on the next session start.
Advanced_Unlock: Unlock experimental features, developer tools, and advanced configuration options
Advanced_Advanced_mode: Advanced mode adds a new icon to the main navigation bar
getKeybind_Ask_Next_Step_Message: Take screenshot and ask AI for the next step suggestion
getKeybind_Previous_Response_Message: Navigate to the previous AI response
getKeybind_Next_Response_Message: Navigate to the next AI response
getKeybind_Scroll_Response_Up_Message: Scroll the AI response content up
getKeybind_Scroll_Response_Down_Message: Scroll the AI response content down
Help_Start: Start a Session: Enter your Gemini API key and click 'Start Session'
Help_Customize: Customize: Choose your profile and language in the settings
Help_Position: Position Window: Use keyboard shortcuts to move the window to your desired location
Help_Text: Text Messages: Type questions or requests to the AI using the text input
Help_Get_help: Get help with interview questions and responses
Help_Assistance: Assistance with sales conversations and objection handling
Help_Support: Support for professional meetings and discussions
Help_Help_with_presentations: Help with presentations and public speaking
Help_Guidance: Guidance for business negotiations and deals
Help_Academic: Academic assistance for test-taking and exam questions
Help_The_AI: The AI listens to conversations and provides contextual assistance based on what it hears.
Help_You_Can: üí° You can customize these shortcuts in the Settings page!
Help_The_AI_will: The AI will analyze your screen and audio to provide assistance
Advanced_Content_Protection_msg1: Content protection makes the application window invisible to screen sharing and recording software.
Advanced_Content_Protection_msg2: This is useful for privacy when sharing your screen, but may interfere with certain display setups like DisplayLink.
Advanced_invisible: The application is currently invisible to screen sharing and recording software.
Advanced_visible: The application is currently visible to screen sharing and recording software.
Advanced_Warning_msg: Don't mess with these settings if you don't know what this is about. Incorrect rate limiting settings may cause the application to stop working properly or hit API limits unexpectedly.
Advanced_Throttle_tokens: Throttle tokens when close to rate limit
Advanced_Maximum_number: Maximum number of tokens allowed per minute before throttling kicks in
Advanced_Start_throttling: Start throttling when this percentage of the limit is reached
Advanced_Reset_rate: Reset rate limiting settings to default values
Advanced_action_will_permanently: This action will permanently delete all local data and cannot be undone.
History_Start_a_session: Start a session to see your conversation history here
